block_comment: This block of Verilog code is a conditional statement inside a sequential logic block that stores the incoming address into miss_address register. The always statement updates the value at every positive edge of the i_clk (suggesting it's synchronous design). The condition checks if the current state of the system is idle, represented by the "c_state" variable equalling "CS_IDLE". Only when the system is in an idle state, the value of the incoming address "i_address" is latched into the "miss_address" register.
